Generation IV.Diamond: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.
Generation IV.Pearl: It makes its Murkrow cronies bring it food. It idles its time away, grooming itself in its nest.
Generation IV.Platinum: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
Generation IV.HeartGold: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

Generation V.Black: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
Generation V.White: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
Generation V.Black 2: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
Generation V.White 2: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."

Generation VI.X: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
Generation VI.Y: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.

Generation VII.Sun: A single cry from this nocturnal Pokémon, and more than a hundred of its Murkrow cronies will assemble.
Generation VII.Moon: If its Murkrow cronies fail to catch food for it, or if it feels they have betrayed it, it will hunt them down wherever they are and punish them.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It will absolutely not forgive failure from or betrayal by its goons. It has no choice in this if it wants to maintain the order of the flock.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its goons take care of most of the fighting for it. The only time it dirties its own hands is in delivering a final blow to finish off an opponent.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Becoming active at night, it is known to form flocks with numerous Murkrow in tow.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It makes its Murkrow cronies bring it food. It idles its time away, grooming itself in its nest.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: One cry from this Pokémon, and a murder of Murkrow come flying. At such times, one would think the curtain of night had fallen, plunging the world into jet-black darkness.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.
Generation IX.Violet: A single cry from this nocturnal Pokémon, and more than 100 of its Murkrow cronies will assemble.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Crimson Mirelands : Cloudpool Ridge Night , massive mass outbreaks Cobalt Coastlands : Bathers' Lagoon Night
